text: "Some Guys Have All the Luck" is a 1973 song by American R&B; group The Persuaders and made number 39 in the United States and number 64 in Canada. It was covered by Robert Palmer in 1982 and Rod Stewart in 1984 and went to number 10 in the United States. It was taken from Stewart's 13th studio album Camouflage. Category:1973 songs Category:R&B; songs Category:Synth-pop songs Category:Robert Palmer songs Category:Rod Stewart songs Category:Louise Mandrell songs
title: Some Guys Have All the Luck
